net.callumtaylor.asynchttp.response
Class JSONObjectResponseHandler

java.lang.Object
  net.callumtaylor.asynchttp.response.AsyncHttpResponseHandler
      net.callumtaylor.asynchttp.response.JSONObjectResponseHandler

public class JSONObjectResponseHandler
extends AsyncHttpResponseHandler

This uses the standard JSON parser which is bundled with Android. This is not the same as JsonResponseHandler

Method Detail

onPublishedDownloadProgress

public void onPublishedDownloadProgress(byte[] chunk,
                                        int chunkLength,
                                        long totalProcessed,
                                        long totalLength)
Description copied from class: AsyncHttpResponseHandler
Called when a chunk has been downloaded from the request. This will be called once every chunk request, and once extra when all the content is downloaded.

Overrides:
onPublishedDownloadProgress in class AsyncHttpResponseHandler
Parameters:
chunk - The chunk of data. This will be the null after the total amount has been downloaded.
chunkLength - The length of the chunk
totalProcessed - The total amount of data processed from the request.
totalLength - The total size of the request. note: This can be -1 during download.

onSuccess

public JSONObject onSuccess()
Processes the response from the stream. This is not ran on the UI thread

Specified by:
onSuccess in class AsyncHttpResponseHandler
Returns:
The data represented as a gson JsonElement primitive type

onFailure

public JSONObject onFailure()
Description copied from class: AsyncHttpResponseHandler
Called when a response was not 2xx.

Overrides:
onFailure in class AsyncHttpResponseHandler
Returns:
The modified data set, or null
